text: Rendez-vous avec Maurice Chevalier n°1 is a French short film directed by Maurice Régamey in 1954. == Synopsis == Maurice Chevalier visits several artists to discuss their work. == Songs == == References == == External links == * Category:1954 films Category:1954 short films Category:French black-and- white films Category:French short films Category:French films Category:Maurice Chevalier
title: Rendez-vous avec Maurice Chevalier n°1
